sentence.Network_en: The region became a hodgepodge of languages and dialects, some from the east, some from the south and some from other countries entirely.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个地区成为语言和方言的大杂烩，有些来自东部，有些来自南部，而有些完全是来自别的国家。

sentence.Network_en: This box is a hodgepodge of books, old toys and things.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个箱子里,书 、 旧玩具及其他物品混杂在一起.

sentence.Network_en: Fang Hung - chien wished he could have said, No wonder your honorable work is such a hodgepodge.
sentence.Network_cn: 方鸿 渐 恨不能说: “怪不得阁下的大作也是那样斑驳陆离.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: changed by association with Hodge

entry.tran: 混杂物;大杂烩;杂乱无章的一堆
entry.def: A hodgepodge is an untidy mixture of different types of things.

example.ex: ...a hodgepodge of maps, small tools, and notebooks.
example.tran: 地图、小工具和笔记本胡乱堆在一起

means.word_mean: 2. a theory or argument made up of miscellaneous or incongruous ideas
